thread.title: How this Syrian refugee became a tech mentor
thread.title_full: How this Syrian refugee became a tech mentor

title: How this Syrian refugee became a tech mentor
text:
How this Syrian refugee became a tech mentor by Jordan Malter & Nadine Schmidt @CNNTech Asem Hasna lost his leg in Syria and traveled from Jordan to Germany. Now he has an internship at Cisco and is teaching refugee youth about robotics in his spare time. Here is his powerful story. Related Videos U.S. stocks post best winning streak in 25 years
